attributes.action: Strongly urge the South African Government to enforce existing legislation in enabling fruit pickers to operate collectively as a union in order to get a fair wage for their very hard work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fruit pickers, which is only a seasonal occupation in South Africa, are paid 250 rand per week which is about £3.50. This is outrageous in a country like South Africa. We strongly urge the large corporations who buy this fruit to put pressure on the growers to pay their workers a fair wage.
